stimulusHtml: Which of the following is not a condition for a chi-square goodness-of-fit test?
choicesHtml: Data should be collected using a random sample or randomized experiment.
When sampling without replacement, the sample size cannot be greater than 10Â percent of the population size.
All expected counts should be greater than 5.
The distribution of the sample should be approximately normal.
During the sampling process, each individual chosen should be independent of the next.
